title: The Beginnings
description: Night Of The Witches-The Beginnings- is the first book in a series which chronicles the life of a young girl and how she becomes an enchantress of the dark ways. Conceived through rape, Damiana Novella, a sixteen-year-old child from Spain is forced to flee for her life. Stowed away aboard a ship heading for Hispaniola, Damiana is soon caged like an animal. Her aversion towards life begins. Befriended by a group of slaves, Damiana is introduced to the practice of Voodoo, which she will soon fashion into her magic. Now faced with certain death or the opportunity of eternal life, Damiana is about to perform the most important sacrifice of her life!
author: Don Festge
